snippet.title: Bloodhunt - The Game Awards 2021 Trailer | PS5, PC
snippet.description:
As announced at The Game Awards show, we will be launching Bloodhunt in Spring 2022 for PlayStation®5 and PC.  

Join the Bloodhunt and become the ultimate vampire! Bloodhunt is a free battle royale game set in the Vampire: The Masquerade universe. A treacherous betrayal has stirred a war amongst the vampires, who are also being targeted for annihilation by a secret society known as the Entity. Use your supernatural powers, weapons and wit in this thrilling battle royale game to dominate the night and restore the order.  

Developed and published by Sharkmob from Malmö, Sweden.  

Wishlist now on: 

https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/vampire-the-masquerade-bloodhunt/ 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/760160/  

Subscribe to our YouTube channel to stay up to date with the latest on Bloodhunt, and follow us on our other social media channels:  

Website: https://Bloodhunt.com  
Twitter: https://Twitter.com/Bloodhunt  
Discord: https://Discord.gg/Bloodhunt  
Facebook: https://Facebook.com/Bloodhuntgame  
Twitch: https://Twitch.tv/Bloodhuntgame  
Linktr.ee: https://Linktr.ee/Bloodhunt 
VK: https://vk.com/bloodhuntgame
